DOC.HEADLINE: IT TURNED_OUT TO BE A GREEN CHRISTMAS FOR FLORIDA FAMILY
DOC.TEXT: On Christmas morning , Johnnie Mosley handed her husband , Charles , a Christmas_gift with the words : " This is the best I can do this year.I love you. " It was a winning $ 15.7-million lottery ticket . " I didn ' t put it under the tree , " Johnnie Mosley told lottery officials Monday when she and her family turned_in the winning ticket for the Sept . 4 Lotto jackpot . She had kept the ticket in a safety_deposit_box along with a collection of newspaper_clippings detailing a search for the winner . The Mosleys will receive $ 789 # 000 annually for 20 years .
